name: elaborately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that includes a lot of careful detail or many detailed parts: It was the most elaborately decorated cake - all sugar flowers and bows. The company makes elaborately carved wooden chairs. See
elaborate
More examplesFewer examplesThe elaborately staged shows take on topics like environmentalism. The bench is elaborately constructed with dovetails and mortise and tenon joints.He gave an elaborately complex explanation as to why he couldn't come.
